itunes:title: The Latest Literary Trend: Writing Partnerships
title: The Latest Literary Trend: Writing Partnerships
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais chats with bestselling author duos, Liz Fenton and Lisa Steinke, as well as Lynne and Valerie Constantine (who write as Liv Constantine) about the pros and cons of writing partnerships, as well as everything you need to know to run one. After this discussion, Bianca is on the search for her bosom writing pal!
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais chats with bestselling author duos, Liz Fenton and Lisa Steinke, as well as Lynne and Valerie Constantine (who write as Liv Constantine) about the pros and cons of writing partnerships, as well as everything you need to know to run one. After this discussion, Bianca is on the search for her bosom writing pal!
itunes:author: Bianca Marais, Liz Fenton, Lisa Steinke, Lynne Constantine, Valerie Constantine, Liv Constantine
itunes:keywords: publishing, writing, advice, writing partnerships, Liv Constantine, Lynn Constantine, Valerie Constantine, Liz Fenton, Lisa Steinke, Bianca Marais
